label: 棟別銭
本: The Kamakura Bakufu:  A Study in Documents . Stanford University Press . 1976
説明文: (or munabechi sen) An emergency tax levied on households, generally for some construction or repair project. There is some evidence that late-Kamakura shugo had partial responsibility for this levy, but it became a regular means of taxation only in Muromachi times.　[守護]
